dialogue: Father is digging for compliments. Don't indulge him.
The property is beautiful.
Cultural?
Foreign affairs.
She is, yes, but we haven't explored her options.
Does she understand English?
Oh yes. She understands very well.
Rub-a-dub, three maids in a tub. And who do you think were there? The butcher, the baker, the candlestick-maker-
He takes some water in his mouth and spits it out.
Invigorating, isn't it?
Did you ever manage to find the place?
He's caught a flu. He's recovering at home.
That explains it! Jim Simpson mentioned he hadn't been on-site since last Friday.
It's going around. Please, sit down.
I'm fine to stand.
Fine to stand? Is something wrong, Mrs. Toth?
Yes, something is wrong.
I've come tonight to tell you something that is going to be very difficult to hear.
And for you people too. I don't know you but it will be difficult for you to hear.
If this is a professional matter then perhaps you and I should talk in the other room.
Your father is a rapist.
Excuse me - whatever this is supposed to be, I don't like it. I'm calling your husband to come and fetch you.
Your father is an evil rapist.
That's enough. You come in here making vague, laughable accusations! I want you out of our house this instant.
Tell them what you did to my husband. Tell them what you did.
I'm fine, Maggie. I'm fine. Can you help me to my car? A taxi's waiting for me at the front.
You never come back here, you crazy woman.
I am so sorry for the bizarre interruption.
